plot: These are the last days of the shantytown quarter called "the Boxes" in southern Tel Aviv, a poor rundown neighborhood that the municipality is trying to erase.
title: Haim Beargazim
plot_es: These are the last days of the shantytown quarter called "the Boxes" in southern Tel Aviv, a poor rundown neighborhood that the municipality is trying to erase.
plot_en: These are the last days of the shantytown quarter called "the Boxes" in southern Tel Aviv, a poor rundown neighborhood that the municipality is trying to erase.
